Reviews.Title: Well, it is pretty good phone..
Reviews.Author: Min
Reviews.Content: I used this phone for about less than a month.It was operating of 2.3 Ginger bread by the time that i got it.It states "White" but it is actually just white backdoor cover.Front is still a black screen.Phone itself works pretty fine, but many lagging during the youtube.It is single core 800mhz, i did not expect any high performance from this.It did great job when i was using it. However, it started slowing down once i start to download some apps and files.Maybe it was not NAND FLASH drive attached to the device (just a micro SD which takes longer).occsional websurfing is a good device to use.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Franklin Tineo
Reviews.Content: excellent product I recommend it 100% is what is actually described, besides that is unique, I found it excellent, very good

Reviews.Title: Warranty non-existent
Reviews.Author: InAsia
Reviews.Content: This phone worked for about three months. Samsung customer service advised me that this unlocked GT S5830M phone is an international phone and not covered by their warranty, and that it is common for it to start losing functionality after a short period of time. They said it originated from Pakistan.Buyer Beware!

Reviews.Title: Conforme
Reviews.Author: Lenin Arrieta
Reviews.Content: Muy contento con este teléfono trabaja muy bien con las operadoras aquí en Venezuela, proveedor muy reponsable llego a tiempo

Reviews.Title: daniel reyes
Reviews.Author: alberto reyes maiz
Reviews.Content: el envio fue enviado a tiempo y recibo a tiempo tambien  felicitaciones a la seriedad de la tienda no dudare en comprar nuevamente

Reviews.Title: can not get it to work with skype video
Reviews.Author: Bob Sacamano
Reviews.Content: picture quality is ok.  call sound is ok. i can not get phone to work with skype video. wi fi works ok.

Reviews.Title: Product works very good
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: I choose this rating as this product is good but not great. I still have a very hard time picking up WI-Fithat i have in the house......also the battery drains very quickly, maybe i am doing something wrong  by letting it continuously roam, however i charge the battery very often...I do like this phone however,it has a lot of kool features for a low to mid-range phone and apart fro m the previous disadvantages the phone works great. Like it...not too big and not too small.I would definitely recommend this phone as the volumes are great ..speaker phone and pictures are not as bad as some say. takes a decent photo also.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: J. Guerra "Julian"
Reviews.Content: Very poor battery cycle. Camera quality is mediocre. Otherwise phone is okay. Have been using this phone for 2 yrs.

Reviews.Title: This phone is so so
Reviews.Author: Mr. Elvis
Reviews.Content: The phone comes with Android 2.3.4 installed is a nices.The bad:The ROM is from China. The only languages ''are: English and other Asians.The seller does not know how to put other languages ''like Spanish or Portuguese.The electrical connector is poor and unoriginal.
